## Annotation and Enrichment : `r annot`

```{r , echo=FALSE , message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
annotDir <- paste0(dataDir,"/","04-Enrichment_analysis/")
dir.create(path=annotDir)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.path=annotDir
)
```

The Enrichment are performed using hypergeometric tests to find annotation terms that are specifically over or under-represented in a given list of `r omics.dic[[omictype]][["variableName"]]` with respect to a reference specified by an annotation file.
